attributes.action: The UK Government should fund sending Professor Stephen Hawking into space!
attributes.additional_details: Disability is a much changed condition.  Steven Hawking has shown that with his work.  Now lets knock down another barrier.
attributes.background: Steven Hawking is our most prominent Physicist and a house-hold name.  He has lived locked in to his body and derived his theories in his mind.  What a wonderful reward the world could give him to let him  experience orbit.
